title: there have been many false accusations as of late made by those who would see my good name tarnished
body:
im just here to make 1 thing clear

as king of gd, i decree that fire emblem is NOT anime, it is a video game

there is absolutely no way fire emblem could be anime

fire emblem is good, anime is garbage

you play fire emblem, you don't play anime

remember, fire emblem is NOT anime
